PathOfBuilding.Notes:
total dps vs boss : dps + ignite * 4
(base + emberwake + 200% of ignite debuff)
55 + 87 * 4 = 400kk dps vs boss
TAILWIND MOD ON BOOTS
new stuff :
burning arrow/vaal, blast rain, explosive arrow
